title: United Kingdom Tourism Revenues
description: Tourism Revenues in the United Kingdom increased to 2749 GBP Million in June from 2225 GBP Million in May of 2022. Tourism Revenues in the United Kingdom averaged 1086.20 GBP Million from 1980 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 3521 GBP Million in July of 2017 and a record low of 61 GBP Million in June of 2020. This page provides - United Kingdom Tourism Revenues- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Office for National Statistics
